mapper.sql: RES_ID, RES_NAME, RES_ICON, RES_LEVEL, RES_SORT, RES_TYPE, RES_URL, RES_VALUE, RES_PARENT

insert into HS_RESOURCES
RES_ID,
RES_NAME,
RES_ICON,
RES_LEVEL,
RES_SORT,
RES_TYPE,
RES_URL,
RES_VALUE,
RES_PARENT,

mapper.update:
update HS_RESOURCES
RES_NAME = #{resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_ICON = #{resIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_LEVEL = #{resLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RES_SORT = #{resSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RES_TYPE = #{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_URL = #{resUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_VALUE = #{resValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_PARENT = #{resParent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RES_ID = #{resId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update HS_RESOURCES set RES_NAME = #{resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES_ICON = #{resIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES_LEVEL = #{resLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RES_SORT = #{resSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RES_TYPE = #{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES_URL = #{resUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES_VALUE = #{resValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES_PARENT = #{resParent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RES_ID = #{resId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(RES_ID) from HS_RESOURCES where 1<>2
and RES_NAME like #{resName}
select RES_ID, RES_ICON, RES_LEVEL, RES_NAME, RES_SORT, RES_TYPE, RES_URL, RES_VALUE, RES_PARENT from HS_RESOURCES
